title: Notificare - Demo Website
description: Helping brands creating moments of delight. Because every superhero needs a sidekick.
author: @notificare

home.title: Welcome
home.description: Helping brands creating moments of delight. Because every superhero needs a sidekick.

inbox.title: Inbox
inbox.description: A message inbox for your apps. Increase engagement rates with campaigns that are always visible.

store.title: Store Locator
store.description: Manage your venues in one single place. Transform your user's location into relevant information.

events.title: Actionable Analytics
events.description: Collect any data point that makes sense for your business. Put it to work by creating event-driven campaigns.

assets.title: Personalized Content
assets.description: Helping brands creating moments of delight. Because every superhero needs a sidekick.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Give users the options they need to trust your brand.

404.title: These aren't the droids you're looking for
404.description: Probably the page you are looking for does not exist or was recently moved. If you think something is wrong please contact us.

cta.title: Want a free demo instead?
cta.text: Start testing all our features today

email.label: E-mail address
email.serverError: We could not subscribe you at this moment. Please try again later.
email.success: Great! Thanks for joining Notificare, please check your inbox.

onBoarding.text: Would you like to receive push notifications from our website?

eventForm.title: Register Custom Events
eventForm.text: Use this form to register custom events and test actionable analytics for this demo website.

eventData.label: Event Data
eventData.placeholder: Use a JSON object to pass custom data with your event

alerts.error: We could not create an event at this time

assetForm.title: Search Asset Groups
assetForm.text: Use this form to search asset groups created for this demo website.

asset.error: Please insert an asset group name

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.text: Receive messages with our news, events or any other campaign we might find relevant for you

location.title: Location Services
location.text: Allow us to collect your location in order to send notifications whenever you are around

dnd.title: Do Not Disturb
dnd.text: Configure a period of time where notification will not generate browser alerts

press.title: Press
press.text: Subscribe me to the group of devices that would like to receive all the news via push notifications

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.text: Subscribe me to the group of devices that would like to receive your newsletter

events.title: Events
events.text: Subscribe me to the group of devices that would like to receive all the events via push notifications
